description: This file defines the MockDoorLock class, a mock implementation of a Zigbee door lock device for testing purposes. It includes methods for locking, unlocking, toggling, and configuring the lock, as well as managing battery and tamper status.

classes.name: MockDoorLock
classes.description: A mock implementation of a Zigbee door lock device for testing purposes, supporting lock/unlock operations, battery status, tamper detection, and pin management.

methods.name: MockDoorLock
methods.description: Constructor initializing the mock door lock with default clusters and profiles.

methods.name: isLocked
methods.description: Returns whether the door lock is currently locked.

methods.name: lock
methods.description: Locks the door lock.

methods.name: unlock
methods.description: Unlocks the door lock.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the lock state between locked and unlocked.

methods.name: isLowBattery
methods.description: Checks if the battery is low.

methods.name: setLowBattery
methods.description: Sets the low battery status.

methods.name: setBatteryVoltage
methods.description: Updates the battery voltage.

methods.name: getBatteryVoltage
methods.description: Retrieves the current battery voltage.

methods.name: isTampered
methods.description: Checks if the lock has been tampered with.

methods.name: setTampered
methods.description: Sets the tampered status.

methods.name: isInvalidCodeEntryLimit
methods.description: Checks if the invalid code entry limit has been reached.

methods.name: setInvalidCodeEntryLimit
methods.description: Sets the invalid code entry limit.

methods.name: setLockBoltJammed
methods.description: Indicates whether the lock bolt is jammed.

methods.name: isLockBoltJammed
methods.description: Checks if the lock bolt is jammed.

methods.name: addPin
methods.description: Adds a PIN to the lock.

methods.name: getPinCount
methods.description: Returns the number of PIN entries.

methods.name: getMaxPinCodeLength
methods.description: Retrieves maximum PIN code length.

methods.name: getMinPinCodeLength
methods.description: Retrieves minimum PIN code length.

methods.name: getMaxPinCodesSupported
methods.description: Returns the maximum number of PIN codes supported.

methods.name: getAutoRelockSeconds
methods.description: Gets the auto-relock timer in seconds.

methods.name: setAutoRelockSeconds
methods.description: Sets the auto-relock timer.

methods.name: getPins
methods.description: Returns the collection of PIN entries.
